Test Name: SARS-CoV-2 RNA Detection via Droplet Digital PCR (ddPCR)
Specimen Type: Fresh, frozen, or formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue specimens
Purpose: To detect SARS-CoV-2 RNA in tissue specimens for diagnostic purposes.
Container: Sterile container for fresh/frozen tissue or FFPE block
Equipment: Droplet Digital PCR system, tissue homogenizer or microdissection tools, RNA extraction kit
